title: storage and filecache corruption?
body:
oc_filecache table gets entries for root storage referring to user files.

due to problems with migration, new database was set up for own cloud 5.0.7 (and several times now due to this issue).

i suspect some of this is related to occasional errors logged in apache with some errant references to the wrong data directory (see apache log below).  documents is the default server root, owncloud is not in the default.

listing of /library/webserver/owncloud5:
````
sh-3.2# ls -al /library/webserver/owncloud5/
total 216
drwxr-xr-x  27 admin  staff    918 jun  6 08:55 .
drwxr-xr-x   9 root   wheel    306 mar 27 07:18 ..
-rw-r--r--   1 admin  staff   6148 mar 25 13:43 .ds_store
-rw-r--r--   1 admin  staff   1353 jun  6 08:55 .htaccess
drwxr-xr-x  34 admin  staff   1156 jun  6 08:55 3rdparty
-rw-r--r--   1 admin  staff    585 jun  6 08:55 authors
-rw-r--r--   1 admin  staff  34520 jun  6 08:55 copying-agpl
-rw-r--r--   1 admin  staff    567 jun  6 08:55 copying-readme
-rw-r--r--   1 admin  staff    753 jun  6 08:55 readme
drwxrwx---  32 admin  _www    1088 jun  6 08:55 apps
drwxrwx---   5 admin  _www     170 jun 12 10:55 config
drwxr-xr-x  14 admin  staff    476 jun  6 08:55 core
-rw-r--r--   1 admin  staff   3156 jun  6 08:55 cron.php
-rw-r--r--   1 admin  staff  17665 jun  6 08:55 db_structure.xml
drwxr-xr-x   3 admin  staff    102 jun  6 08:55 files

-rw-r--r--   1 admin  staff    853 jun  6 08:55 index.php
drwxr-xr-x  83 admin  staff   2822 jun  6 08:55 l10n
drwxr-xr-x  65 admin  staff   2210 jun  6 08:55 lib
drwxr-xr-x   5 admin  staff    170 jun  6 08:55 ocs
-rw-r--r--   1 admin  staff    443 jun  6 08:55 public.php
-rw-r--r--   1 admin  staff    960 jun  6 08:55 remote.php
-rw-r--r--   1 admin  staff     26 jun  6 08:55 robots.txt
drwxr-xr-x   6 admin  staff    204 jun  6 08:55 search
drwxr-xr-x  16 admin  staff    544 jun  6 08:55 settings
-rw-r--r--   1 admin  staff   1216 jun  6 08:55 status.php
drwxr-xr-x   3 admin  staff    102 jun  6 08:55 themes
````
datadirectory in config/config.php is => '/volumes/data/cloud'

web root folder for owncloud is /library/webserver/owncloud5

database: mysql  ver 14.14 distrib 5.5.28, for osx10.6 (i386) using readline 5.1

entries in oc_storages:
mysql> select * from oc_storages;
````
+---------------------------------------+------------+
| id                                    | numeric_id |
+---------------------------------------+------------+
| local::/volumes/data/cloud/           |          6 |
| local::/volumes/data/cloud/admin/     |          1 |

| local::/volumes/data/cloud/dreese/    |          5 |

| local::/volumes/data/cloud/roadtoca/  |         10 |
| local::/volumes/data/cloud/sreese/    |          8 |
+---------------------------------------+------------+
````

````
|  85656 |       6 | mattreese/files/roadtocalifornia/2012/faculty/gallagher-abbott, kelly  | fbafd24a1fd805eab7ce9e04e9035c1d |  85652 | gallagher-abbott, kelly  |        2 |        1 |    0 | 1372005668 |         0 |                0 | 51ca085512ba3 |
+--------+---------+------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------+--------+--------------------------+----------+----------+------+------------+-----------+------------------+---------------+
29 rows in set (0.01 sec)
````

i have no idea how to reproduce this issue, it seems to occur with owncloud client version 1.2.5 so there are no browser logs to submit.

all of the user files are also in oc_filecache for the user storage, one example of a folder is:
````
mysql> select * from oc_filecache where path='files/roadtocalifornia/2012/faculty';
+--------+---------+-------------------------------------+----------------------------------+--------+---------+----------+----------+-----------+------------+-----------+------------------+---------------+
| fileid | storage | path                                | path_hash                        | parent | name    | mimetype | mimepart | size      | mtime      | encrypted | unencrypted_size | etag          |
+--------+---------+-------------------------------------+----------------------------------+--------+---------+----------+----------+-----------+------------+-----------+------------------+---------------+
|  47961 |       7 | files/roadtocalifornia/2012/faculty | b2b1b59a4e4294858a3662cca7f0119a |  43799 | faculty |        2 |        1 | 390428554 | 1372194238 |         0 |                0 | 51ca05be9e28a |
+--------+---------+-------------------------------------+----------------------------------+--------+---------+----------+----------+-----------+------------+-----------+------------------+---------------+
1 row in set (0.03 sec)
````

this corruption appears to grow over time, i can find no pattern, it happens with multiple users.  i have reset to a new database several times when this corruption grows to a large level, am now writing a perl script to match the database oc_filecache against the actual files in datadirectory to identify, and potentially, resolve errant entries.

operating system:
mac os x server 10.8.2

server: server: apache/2.2.22 (unix) dav/2 php/5.3.15 with suhosin-patch mod_ssl/2.2.22 openssl/0.9.8r

owncloud version: 5.0.7

### logs
#### web server error log
(192.168.1.6 is the private ip address of the server where owncloud resides)

````
[tue jun 25 11:20:33 2013] [error] [client 192.168.1.6] file does not exist: /library/webserver/owncloud5/data
[tue jun 25 11:20:33 2013] [error] [client 192.168.1.6] file does not exist: /library/webserver/documents/core

[tue jun 25 13:15:46 2013] [error] [client 192.168.1.6] file does not exist: /library/webserver/documents/core
````
